item.description:
ABL is going back to the 1st/3rd Friday schedule.

Dance lesson at 7:00 - All levels

Dancing 8:00 onward.

There is no bar but there are snacks - usually pizza and cookies - and beverages - usually coffee, water and wine.

The lesson normally starts off simply with easy basics and usually moves into something more challenging for experienced dancers.

Check  http://abldance.com/ for details.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for me after the lesson - the folks at the desk can point me out to you. Also - I have been printing out a meetup sign to put on one of the tables to give us a place to gather.

group.name: Salsa, Swing, Latin & Ballroom Dancers of Metro Worcester

item.name: Third Friday Latin Dance Lounge
